mosinstall.name: MosCom Latest X
mosinstall.author: Chanh Ong
mosinstall.copyright: This module is released under the GNU/GPL License
mosinstall.description:
MosCom Latest X uses these _COM_C_POST, _COM_C_DATE_ON and _COM_C_DATE_AT from MosCom language file to display the comment meta text. (requires MosCom 1.0f+)

(see MosCom readme.txt for more detail)

Support COAddOns in making a small donation!

param.name: number_posts
param.label: Number of posts
param.description: Number of article that has new comment to show

param.name: max_length
param.label: Max. length
param.description: Maximum length of posts before truncated

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (moduletable_sfx), this allows individual module styling
